title: Looking for duo, i have an account in ever elo. I play bot lane and jungle.
body: Looking for serious duo in any elo to chill with and just have fun while climbing. Must have a mic.

replies.body: Im Silver 4 add me (Jhinception) if u wanna ranked any time, i have a mic
do u have a dia 1+ acc? then add me on plankgang for some ranked n chill
Oh if you would like to talk atm I'm on my plat acc add mungindipride

Aight im not gonna cry like these others about bronze elo hell, cause I fkn love that shit, im a support main who can play pretty much any other lane except for jungle cause fark dat shit man, im a serious ranked player that spends most of my time playing with my 3 mates but they have sorta slowed down since Pokemon Go, so i need another mate to play with. Im happy to que with you on any of your accounts i got a mic and use discord and skype guessing you understand what they are.last season i was placed into B1 even though i went 6/4 in first promos but since then ive rack'd up a lot of time on league 1000+ wins worth in 1 year. atm me and the other friend i got who hasnt dropped league are easily climbing. but we can always use another to be chill and climb in our call while we fuck kids with our lvl 7 spam xD

add me if you want man its WindWaII ( its 2 capital ii's btw not 2 ll's i sorta got on the yas train to late)
Hey would like a duo having a bad time in ranked sliver 4
i could use a decent player to help me climb. im bronze but i shouldnt be... juskillmealredy

I am stuck in Bronze, I made it to Silver last season playing solo queue but it is nearly impossible now. I am ready to uninstall the game but I would like to give it one last shot. I know we all have bad games from time to time but I am looking for people to duo queue with (using curse as well) 

Add me in the game - League101

I am willing to try one last time to get out of bronze. If I play to my ability and play smart, I believe I should be top Silver maybe even lower Gold.
